attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for anybody who feels strongly about Fluoide being added to our drinking water. It is mass medication of a toxic substance. Sodium Fluoride is nothing more (or less) than a hazardous waste by-product of the nuclear and aluminum industries. We the undersigned should have a choice in this matter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
